column2: "Da no ara Jesus fiir fie kɛtsenaa mpoano."
"Na nyimpadodow pii behyiaa ne nkyɛn
column3: ma dɛm ntsi ɔkɔr hɛn mu kɛtsenaa ase wɔ mu; na nyimpadodow no nyina gyinagyinaa mpoano."

column2: "Na ɔkaa ndzɛmba pii kyerɛɛ hɔn wɔ mbɛbu mu see dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: oduafo no kɔree kɛpee aba;"

column2: "na ɔrepe aba no
column3: bi koguu kwan nkyɛn na nnoma bae bɔsosɔwee;"

column2: "na bi koguu abosam do mbrɛ oennya dɛtse pii; na ntsɛmara na ofirii
column3: osiandɛ oennya dɛtse a ɔdɔ;"

column2: "na ewia soɛree no
column3: onyinyamee na osiandɛ onnyi ndwow ntsi ɔkyenkyenee."

column2: "Na bi so koguu nsoɛ mu
column3: na ofifirii ara na nsoɛ no miaa no."

column2: "Na bi so koguu asaase pa mu
column3: na ɔsoow aba
column4: bi ɔha

column2: "Nyia ɔwɔ aso no
column3: ma ontsie."

column2: "N'esuafo no baa ne nkyɛn bɛsee no dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze ntsi na ekasa kyerɛ hɔn mbɛbu mu yi?"

column2: "Na obuae see hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom dze
column4: wɔdze ama hom dɛ hom nhu sor ahenman no mu esumasɛm

column2: "Na obiara a ɔwɔ no
column3: na wɔbɛma no na oenya mbordo
column4: na obiara a onnyi no
column5: dza ɔwɔ mpo wɔbɛgye ne nsamu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na mekasa kyerɛ hɔn mbɛbu mu
column3: osiandɛ wɔhwɛ a wonnhu
column4: wɔtse a wonntsie

column2: "Na hɔn mu na Isaia nkɔnhyɛ no aba mu dɛ
column3: Tse dze
column4: hom bɛtse naaso hom nnkɛtse ase; Na hwɛ dze

column2: "Na ɔman yi hɔn akoma epirim
column3: Na hɔn aso esisiw dɛ wɔbɛtse Na woemuamua hɔn enyiwa Amma aber bi wɔaammfa hɔn enyiwa ennhu
column4: Na wɔaammfa hɔn aso anntse
column5: Na wɔaammfa hɔn akoma anntse ase
column6: Na wɔaannsakyer Amma maannsa hɔn yarba."

column2: "Na nhyira aka hom enyiwa dɛ wohu
column3: nye hom asowa dɛ wɔtse."

column2: "Na nokwar mese hom dɛ nkɔnhyɛfo nye atseneneefo pii pɛɛ dɛ wohu dza hom hu yi
column3: naaso woennhu
column4: na wɔtse dza hom tse yi

column2: "Afei hom ntsie oduafo no ne bɛ no."
"Sɛ obiara tse ahenman no no ho asɛm
column3: na ɔnntse ase a
column4: ɔbɔn no ba bɛfa dza wɔpee no n'akoma mu no kɔ. Oyi nye dza wɔpee no wɔ kwan nkyɛn no."

column2: "Na dza wɔpee no abosam do no
column3: ɔnye nyia otsie asɛm no
column4: na ntsɛmara ɔdze dɛw gye;"

column2: "na onnyi ndwow wɔ no mu
column3: na ɔwɔ hɔ ma ɔkyɛr kakra
column4: sɛ abɛbrɛsɛ anaa ahohia soɛr wɔ asɛm no ntsi a

column2: "Na dza wɔpee no nsoɛ mu no
column3: nye nyia otsie asɛm no
column4: na wiadze yi mu akɔdadwen nye ahonya ndaadaa mia asɛm no

column2: "Na dza wɔpee no asaase pa mu no
column3: ɔnye nyia otsie asɛm no
column4: na ɔtse ase; ɔno so na ɔsow aba

column2: "Obuu bɛ fofor so kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ
column3: Sor ahenman no tse dɛ nyimpa a oduaa aba pa wɔ no kwa mu;"

column2: "na nyimpa dedae no
column3: ne tamfo bae boduaa nworahaban so wɔ ewifua pa no mu
column4: na ɔkɔree."

column2: "Na oyii ahaban na ɔsoow aba no
column3: nna nworahaban no so daa edzi."

column2: "Na ofiwura no nkowaa bae bɛsee no dɛ
column3: Yewura
column4: ana ammpe aba pa wɔ wo kwa no mu? Na nworahaban yi so fi hen?"

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Ɔtamfo na ɔayɛ yi. Na nkowaa no see no dɛ
column4: Ana epɛ dɛ yɛkɔ kɔboaboa ano?"

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Oho: bɛyɛ na hom roboaboa nworahaban no ano no
column4: hom etutu ewifua no so aka ho."

column2: "Hom mma n'ebien nyina nnyin nkesi twaber no; na twaber no mebɛse etwafo no dɛ
column3: Hom ndzi kan mboaboa nwora no ano
column4: na hom nkyekyer no efiefi ma wɔnhyew no
column5: na hom mboaboa ewifua no ano nkɔ me san do."

column2: "Obuu bɛ fofor so kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ
column3: Sor ahenman no tse dɛ sinape abafua a nyimpa fae koduaa no kwa mu;"

column2: "ɔno na osuar kyɛn aba nyina; na sɛ onyin a
column3: ɔyɛ kɛse kyɛn nhaban nyina na ɔyɛ dua
column4: ma wimu nnoma bɛgyegye n'abaw do."

column2: "Obuu bɛ fofor so see hɔn dɛ
column3: Sor ahenman no tse dɛ mbɔrkaw a ɔbaa fae sumaa mbɔr korbaa ebiasa mu dze kesii dɛ ne nyina kawee."

column2: "Yinom nyina Jesus kaa kyerɛɛ nyimpadodow no wɔ mbɛbu mu
column3: na oennkwetsi bɛ annkasa annkyerɛ hɔn;"

column2: "ma dza nkɔnhyɛnyi  no kae no aaba mu dɛ
column3: Mubobue m'ano wɔ mbɛbu mu; Mebɛpaa mu maka nsɛm a ohuntsa fi wiadze ahyɛse."
column4: "#Dwom 78.2 #13.35 ma dza nkɔnhyɛnyi: Tsetse akyerɛw a wɔagye ato mu no bi ka dɛ: “Nkɔnhyɛnyi Isaia”."

column2: "Nna Jesus gyaa nyimpadodow no kwan na ɔbaa fie. Na n'esuafo no baa ne nkyɛn bɛsee dɛ
column3: Kyerɛ hɛn kwa mu nwora no ho bɛ no ase."

column2: "Na obuae see dɛ
column3: Nyia oduaa aba pa no nye nyimpa Ba;"

column2: "kwa no nye wiadze; aba pa no nye ahenman no ne mba; nwora no nye ɔbɔn no ne mba;"
"ɔtamfo a oduaa hɔn nye abɔnsam; twaber nye wiadze n'ewiei; na etwafo no nye abɔfo no."
"Na dɛ mbrɛ wɔboaboa nwora no ano wɔhyew no wɔ gya mu no
column3: mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ wɔ wiadze n'ewiei nye no."

column2: "Nyimpa Ba no bɔsoma n'abɔfoe na wɔakɔboaboa dza ɔto fintsidua nyina ano efi n'ahenman mu; nye hɔn a wɔyɛ emumuyɛ nyina
column4: "na wɔatow hɔn egu gya fononoo mu: hɔ na osu nye asetwɛr wɔ."

column2: "Ɔno na atseneneefo bɛhyerɛn dɛ ewia wɔ hɔn Egya ahenman mu. Nyia ɔwɔ aso no
column3: ma ontsie."

column2: "Sor ahenman no tse dɛ akoradze a wɔdze sumaa haban mu a nyimpa hunii no
column3: ɔdze huntsae
column4: na no ho dɛw ntsi ɔkɔree kɔtɔɔn dza ɔwɔ nyina na ɔtɔɔ haban no."

column2: "Bio
column3: sor ahenman no tse dɛ batanyi a ɔrohwehwɛ ahondze pa;"

column2: "na ohun ahondze kor a no bo so no
column3: ɔkɔree kɔtɔɔn dza ɔwɔ nyina na ɔkɔtɔe."

column2: "Bio
column3: sor ahenman no tse dɛ eboa a wɔtowee guu po mu a obumaa nam ahorow nyina bi;"

column2: "na ɔyɛɛ ma no
column3: wotwuwii baa mpoano na wɔtsenaa famu
column4: na wɔboaboaa papa no ano guu mbirefi mu
column5: na wɔtoow dza omuo no gui."

column2: "Mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ wɔ wiadze ewiei nye no; abɔfo bɛba abɛpa nyimpa bɔn efi atseneneefo mu
column4: "na wɔatow hɔn egu ogya fononoo mu; hɔ na osu nye asetwɛr wɔ."

column2: "Hom atse yinom nyina ase?  Wobuaa no dɛ
column3: Nyew."

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Dɛm ntsi kyerɛwnyi a wɔayɛ no osuanyi ama sor ahenman no ɔtse dɛ ofiwura a ofi n'adzekorabea yi ndzɛmba afofor nye adadaw pue."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ Jesus wiee mbɛ yi bu no
column3: ofii hɔ kɔree."

column2: "Na ɔkɔr nankasa no kurow mu no
column3: ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔn wɔ hɔn nhyiamudan mu
column4: ma hɔn ho boow hɔn na wɔsee dɛ
column5: Oyi nyaa nyansa nye tum ndwuma yi wɔ hen?"

column2: "Ana nnyɛ dwimfo no ne ba nye yi? Ana ne na wɔmmfrɛ no Mary
column3: na no nuanom nye James
column4: Josef

column2: "Na nnyɛ ne nkyerɛbaa nyina na wɔnye hɛn wɔ ha yi? Na afei oyi nyaa ndzɛmba yinom nyina wɔ hen?"
"Na ɔyɛɛ hɔn fintsidua. Na Jesus see hɔn dɛ
column3: Nkɔnhyɛnyi nnhwer enyidzi gyedɛ nankasa no kurow mu
column4: nye nankasa ne fie."

column2: "Na gyedzi a wonnyi ntsi ɔannyɛ tum ndwuma pii wɔ hɔ."
